vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_5.sol#24-32):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_5.sol#26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_5.sol#28)
